words.definition: to leave a place, thing, or person, usually for ever
words.example: We had to abandon the car.

words.definition: existing as an idea, feeling, or quality, not as a material object
words.example: Truth and beauty are abstract concepts.
The evening was very pleasant, albeit a little quiet.

words.definition: to accept, admit, or recognize something, or the truth or existence of something
words.example: She acknowledged having been at fault.

words.definition: something formed by adding together several amounts or things
words.example: hey purchased an aggregate of 3,000 shares in the company.
